heading: HR00586
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE OR THE NATIONAL POLICE COMMISSION TO, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ADMINISTER A FAITHFUL INVENTORY OF ALL ITS POLICE OFFICERS AND PERSONNEL ON THE MATTER OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE, CIVIL OR CRIMINAL CASES FILED AGAINST THEM AS THE PARAMETERS FOR THEIR IMMEDIATE DISMISSAL FROM THE SERVICE AND RID THE PNP OF ROGUE COPS IN THE PROCESS
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2016-12-13
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00586
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE OR THE NATIONAL POLICE COMMISSION TO, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ADMINISTER A FAITHFUL INVENTORY OF ALL ITS POLICE OFFICERS AND PERSONNEL ON THE MATTER OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE, CIVIL OR CRIMINAL CASES FILED AGAINST THEM AS THE PARAMETERS FOR THEIR IMMEDIATE DISMISSAL FROM THE SERVICE AND RID THE PNP OF ROGUE COPS IN THE PROCESS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-11-28
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY ON 2016-12-13
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-12-05;
